subject: Baseball
Television
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will start each of their A.L. division series games against Cleveland from 5 p.m. to 6:30 p.m. Eastern, beginning with Thursday night’s 6:30 broadcast of Game 1 from Jacobs Field.
snippet: The Yankees will start each of their A.L. division series games against Cleveland from 5 p.m. to 6:30 p.m. Eastern, beginning with Thursday night’s 6:30 broadcast of Game 1 from Jacobs Field.
